sys_soap_message_function.envelope:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:ezwim:esmcaseservice"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <urn:createCase soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/">
<object xsi:type="xsd:string">CASE</object> <sysid xsi:type="xsd:string">${sys_id}</sysid> <description xsi:type="xsd:string">${description}</description> <caller xsi:type="xsd:string">${caller}</caller> <priority xsi:type="xsd:string">${priority}</priority> <number xsi:type="xsd:string">${number}</number> <severity xsi:type="xsd:string">${severity}</severity> <state xsi:type="xsd:string">${state}</state>
<sys_updated_on xsi:type="xsd:string">${sys_updated_on}</sys_updated_on> <hold_reason xsi:type="xsd:string">${hold_reason}</hold_reason> <resolved_by xsi:type="xsd:string">${resolved_by}</resolved_by> <sys_updated_by xsi:type="xsd:string">${sys_updated_by}</sys_updated_by> <active xsi:type="xsd:string">${active}</active> <sys_domain_path xsi:type="xsd:string">${sys_domain_path}</sys_domain_path> <description xsi:type="xsd:string">${description}</description> <work_notes_list xsi:type="xsd:string">${work_notes_list}</work_notes_list>
</urn:createCase> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
